definition: to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit

sentences.english: Suspected arms dealer Viktor Bout will stay in the custody of Thai police.
sentences.chinese: 军火倒爷威克特布特将被泰国警察监管。

sentences.english: Those virtual currency traders will be impacted most by the new policy.
sentences.chinese: 受此政策影响最大的莫过于虚拟货币的“倒爷”。

definition: to buy and sell at a profit/to speculate
speculation and profiteering (idiom); buying and selling on speculation
to resell at a profit/to speculate
to shift from one hand to the other/to change hands (of merchandise)
to speculate/to play the market/(fig.) to sell hot air/to swindle people by posing as a reputable operator
to move/to shift/to exchange/to buy and sell/peddling
(PRC) flow of people from the countryside into the cities/rural migrant without definite prospects/drifter
